Description: Huge 5 bedroom 2 bathroom in Cambridge. Very close to Harvard. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Nice big eat in kitchen. Laundry in the building. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
